title: Brincante (2014)
overview: A lyrical look at Antonio Nóbrega’s universe. A lifetime’s work that is characterized by the consistent reading of popular culture. A show in which all elements of our culture are mixed together. A musical and visual journey, guided by the characters Joáo Sidurino and Rosalina from the plays Brincante and Segundas Histórias.
storyline: Poetic documentary registring the work of Antonio Nobrega. A genius musician-performer-actor who has base on folcloric and regional tradirions and music.
